message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can move on!
You're starting strong, but I'm not getting taken advantage of that easily!
You're pushing for more, Bob. I'll meet you halfway, but don't expect me to give up too much!
You're not giving in yet? I'll take it to the next level!
I'm not backing down, Bob. You're getting closer to a fair deal, but don't expect me to give in completely!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll take what I can get, but I'm not going to get taken for a ride!
I'm not giving up yet, Bob. This is my last reasonable offer. Take it or leave it!
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm taking control of this negotiation!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or we'll both lose everything. I'm not giving up any more!
